name: Backpoka Executive
description: The ultimate work-anywhere backpack with innovative features.
details: The Backpoka Executive offers a multi-use pillow, foldable lapdesk, and 20,000 mAh charger to cater to business travelers and students.

name: Backup Battery - Standard
description: Reliable and compact backup battery for everyday use.
details: This 10,000 mAh battery is perfect for charging your devices on the go.

name: Backup Battery - Pro
description: High-capacity backup battery for power users.
details: With 20,000 mAh capacity, this battery can charge multiple devices simultaneously.

name: Lapdesk Backplate - Standard
description: Standard lapdesk backplate for quick use.
details: A lightweight and durable backplate that transforms your backpack into a lapdesk.

name: Lapdesk Backplate - Pro
description: Advanced lapdesk backplate for enhanced comfort.
details: Ergonomic design with premium materials for ultimate productivity on the go.

name: Travel Pillow - Compact
details: Designed for portability, this pillow ensures comfort on short trips.

name: Travel Pillow - Deluxe
details: Soft and supportive, this pillow is perfect for long journeys.
